entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 20 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
